explanation: [0-0] In an outdoor setting, a girl wearing a denim crop top and denim shorts stands with her hands naturally down, eyes closed, in front of a black car, with a wall in the background. A red and white sign with the word "Shorts" is visible in the upper left corner.

[0-2] The scene switches quickly. First, a girl with a silver ponytail, wearing a black crop top and shorts, appears. Then, a girl with orange-pink hair wearing an avant-garde black outfit with shoulder pads and a black skirt appears. Next, a girl with long, straight black hair wearing a stylish top and high-waisted shorts, designed with a black and grey patchwork, appears. The scene then switches back to the girl in the denim shorts, then to the silver-haired girl, then back to the girl with orange-pink hair, and finally back to the girl with long, straight black hair, who starts dancing while looking forward.
